mapper.select: select * from tb_collect c LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON (c.productId = p.productId) LEFT JOIN tb_img i ON (p.imgId = i.imgId) where c.collectId = #{collectId}

select c.*, p.*, i.* from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_collect c ON (u.userId = c.userId) LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON (c.productId = p.productId) LEFT JOIN tb_img i ON (p.imgId = i.imgId) where c.userId = #{userId}

select c.*, p.*, i.* from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_collect c ON (u.userId = c.userId) LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON (c.productId = p.productId) LEFT JOIN tb_img i ON (p.imgId = i.imgId) where c.userId = #{userId} and p.productStatus = '下架'

select c.*, p.*, i.* from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_collect c ON (u.userId = c.userId) LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON (c.productId = p.productId) LEFT JOIN tb_category g ON (p.categoryId = g.categoryId) LEFT JOIN tb_img i ON (p.imgId = i.imgId) where c.userId = #{userId} and g.categoryName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.productName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.productDec like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
